text:
一个月花费在短视频购物的时间a.15小时以内b.15小时到30小时c.30以上
一个月在短视频购物中的消费支出a.500以内b.500-1000c.1000以上
通常会在什么类型的短视频里被推动下单商品（多选）a. 注明广告类b. 博主测评类c. 直播带货类d. 相关推送类
所有下单的商品是当下真正需要的吗a. 大部分不需要但被说服下单b. 大部分刚好是需要的
下单商品的退货概率a. 几乎不退货b. 较少退货b. 经常退货
trans:
Time spent on shopping via short videos in a month a. within 15 hours b. 15 to 30 hours c. over 30 hours
Expenditure on shopping via short videos in a month a. within 500 b. 500-1,000 c. over 1,000
What types of short videos usually motivate you to order goods (multiple choices) a. noted ads b. blogger reviews c. live streaming with products d. related pushes
Are all the goods ordered really needed at the moment a. mostly aren't needed but are persuaded to order b. mostly are needed right away
Probability of returning an ordered good a. hardly ever b. infrequently b. frequently
